text:
I am studying materials science in an engineering school. But before studying this, I had to choose a subject. Thus, I am going to explain the source of inspiration of my field of study.
All began 2 years ago, when I was in what we call Classe Préparatoire aux Grandes Ecoles in French. It consists in 2 years of hard working mathematics and physics, to be prepared to succeed exams, and obtain the school of our dreams, or not … I worked during these 2 years to get one of the French officer military schools, like ESM de Saint Cyr Coetquidan. But unfortunately, I deeply failed my exam at the end of the preparatory classes. Then I had to reconsider my future, and what I wanted to do in my life. I first eliminated the field which didn’t inspire me, such as computer science, public construction, mathematics etc … But a lot of possibilities remained, and I didn’t know yet what subject I want to study. To be more precise, I had an idea. Physics or Industrial science would interested me. But I didn’t have the good rank enough to get the schools which have theses subjects. So I had to find an other inspiration. And I found it thanks to my cousin. She now works for Naval Group, a society which interests me a lot. And before working in this company, she studied materials science in an engineering school. We talked a lot about her studies and my project, and I concluded materials science would be an interesting field, which would allows me to work in several companies and in several fields. Therefore, I chose the ESIR school, and the specialty materials.
